attributes.action: Restore Funding To Graduates Taking Second Degrees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgraceful that funding has been removed from people taking second degrees meaning universities can charge full fees. This means courses like medicine, veterinary etc are becoming too expensive for people from disadvantaged backgrounds. Its about time the Government restore second degree LEA funding and scrapped unfair tuition fees once and for all

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
